Text:
http://twitchfilm.com/news/2011/06/michel-ocelot-preparing-third-kirikou-feature-film.php

Ocelot first rose to international prominence with 1998's Kirikou And The Sorceress, a magical tale of a tiny little boy and a fearsome sorceress based on African folk legends.  

Ocelot's third Kirikou effort, 
Kirikou: Men And Women. The new feature is currently slated for a Christmas 2012 release.
